description.en: A national joint-stock commercial bank in the People's Republic of China, founded on August 28, 1992, with its headquarters in Shanghai. The bank is listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的银行业监督管理机构，后并入中国银行保险监督管理委员会。曾负责查处浦发银行成都分行违规贷款案。
description.en: The banking regulatory authority of the People's Republic of China, later merged into the China Banking and Insurance Regulatory Commission. It was responsible for investigating the case of illicit lending at the Chengdu branch of SPD Bank.

description.zh-cn: 原上海浦东发展银行成都分行行长，因违规发放贷款案被处以终身禁入银行业的处罚。
description.en: Former head of the Chengdu branch of Shanghai Pudong Development Bank, who was banned from the banking industry for life due to a case of illicit lending.

description.zh-cn: 原上海浦东发展银行成都分行风险部总经理，因违规发放贷款案被处以终身禁入银行业的处罚。
description.en: Former general manager of the risk department at the Chengdu branch of Shanghai Pudong Development Bank, who was banned from the banking industry for life due to a case of illicit lending.

description.zh-cn: 原上海浦东发展银行成都九眼桥支行行长，因违规发放贷款案被处以终身禁入银行业的处罚。
description.en: Former head of the Chengdu Jiuyanqiao sub-branch of Shanghai Pudong Development Bank, who was banned from the banking industry for life due to a case of illicit lending.

description.zh-cn: 2019年3月在中国四川省凉山州木里县发生的森林火灾，造成包括多名消防员在内的严重伤亡。浦发银行曾因不当使用此次事件进行广告宣传而引发争议。
description.en: A forest fire that occurred in Muli County, Liangshan Prefecture, Sichuan Province, China in March 2019, resulting in serious casualties including multiple firefighters. SPD Bank was involved in a controversy for inappropriately using this event in an advertisement.

description.zh-cn: 上海浦东发展银行的全资子公司。

description.zh-cn: 2010年3月10日，广东移动签订协议以398亿元人民币收购浦发银行22.1亿新股。截至2022年12月31日，该公司为浦发银行第二大股东，持股18.18%。
description.en: On March 10, 2010, Guangdong Mobile signed an agreement to acquire 2.21 billion new shares of SPD Bank for RMB 39.8 billion. As of December 31, 2022, it was the second-largest shareholder with an 18.18% stake.

description.zh-cn: 1999年11月10日，上海浦东发展银行在上海证券交易所挂牌上市。
description.en: On November 10, 1999, Shanghai Pudong Development Bank was listed on the Shanghai Stock Exchange.

relationships.source: 中国银监会

description.zh-cn: 2018年1月19日，中国银监会就上海浦东发展银行成都分行违规发放贷款案件，对该分行处以4.62亿元人民币罚款。
description.en: On January 19, 2018, the China Banking Regulatory Commission fined the Chengdu branch of Shanghai Pudong Development Bank RMB 462 million for a case of illicit lending.

relationships.source: 中国银监会

description.zh-cn: 因成都分行违规发放贷款案，王兵被中国银监会处以警告、罚款50万元并终身不得从事银行业工作的处罚。
description.en: Due to the illicit lending case at the Chengdu branch, Wang Bing was warned, fined RMB 500,000, and banned from the banking industry for life by the China Banking Regulatory Commission.

relationships.source: 中国银监会

description.zh-cn: 因成都分行违规发放贷款案，章模华被中国银监会处以警告、罚款50万元并终身不得从事银行业工作的处罚。
description.en: Due to the illicit lending case at the Chengdu branch, Zhang Mohua was warned, fined RMB 500,000, and banned from the banking industry for life by the China Banking Regulatory Commission.

description.en: Due to the illicit lending case at the Chengdu branch, Gao Bo was warned, fined RMB 500,000, and banned from the banking industry for life by the China Banking Regulatory Commission.

relationships.source: 四川木里森林火灾

description.zh-cn: 上海浦东发展银行信用卡中心发布了一张涉及四川木里森林火灾牺牲烈士的海报广告，引发公众争议，并于次日道歉。
description.en: The credit card center of Shanghai Pudong Development Bank released a poster ad involving the martyrs of the Sichuan Muli forest fire, which sparked public controversy and led to an apology the next day.
